data.title: Current Animal Crossing Treasure Island Maps
data.meta_description: Animal Crossing Treasure Islands built by Pange. Item locations. Islands have free access during live streams. Perks for members
data.text:
I host a huge collection of Animal Crossing treasure islands on the Pange Plays Twitch channel and my Discord server for Animal Crossing New Horizons! Here are the active ACNH maps and what types of items you can find on each one! Looking for a specific item? Use my item search page!

For 24/7 Access to the members-only Animal Crossing Treasure Islands, please read my Membership page. This also allows use of the spawner bot to get any item, and spawn any villager in boxes.

Jump to Treasure Island

Members Islands (available on Pange‚Äôs Discord 24/7 for members and occasionally on Twitch)

Hocus Pocus (Max Bells @ Nooks) (V1 and V2)

Cat Land (606 Turnip Price @ Nooks)

Pile of Cats (606 Turnip Price @ Nooks)

Supernova (Max Bells @ Nooks)

Star Hollow (Max Bells @ Nooks)

Pangea (Max Bells @ Nooks)

Purrfecto (606 Turnip Price @ Nooks)

Honeycomb (Max Bells @ Nooks)

Meowtain (606 Turnip Price @ Nooks)

Flora&Fauna (Max Bells @ Nooks)

For Members-Only Islands: Item Search

Free for All Bonus Islands (public 24/7 on on my free dodo code page.)

Reboot (materials island)

TacoCat (materials island)

Coffee Bean (materials island)

Purrito (materials island)

Stumped (materials island)

Animal Crossing Treasure Islands 24/7 Free Dodo Code

I‚Äôve added four free treasure islands that you can visit on my free dodo code page. The other islands are available on my Discord server for members.

ACNH Treasure Islands 2.0 Update

Check my blog post on the Animal Crossing Treasure Islands 2.0 Update

‚ú® Members-Only Islands ‚ú®

Treasure Island: Hocus Pocus (Max Bells @ Nooks)

Animal Crossing Items on Hocus Pocus:

This island features a restart your island starter pack, right at the front of the island, with the materials and furniture you need to unlock your first three villager plots and Nook‚Äôs Cranny. In addition, you‚Äôll find the following sets and items:

Treasure Island: Flora&Fauna (Max Bells at Nooks)

Animal Crossing Items on Flora&Fauna

This is the best treasure island if you‚Äôre looking to complete your museum. Please note that when you pick up bugs, fish, and sea creatures from a treasure island, it doesn‚Äôt count as being ‚Äúcaught‚Äù in your Critterpedia. However Blathers will happily take these donations! Additionally, this island features all colours of flowers, with 40 available of each flower! No need to dig: you‚Äôll find a little black ‚Äúseed‚Äù in each flower‚Äôs section. Simply pick up this seed dot and it will transform into a plantable plant, like windflowers, hyacinths, and all your favourite flowers!

ü™ÑBack to Top ‚ú®

How Do I Access The Animal Crossing New Horizons Treasure Island Live Streams?

I host a selection of my treasure islands for free on my Twitch channel every week. Check my schedule for the next stream option to tune in!

How Do I Access These Animal Crossing New Horizons Treasure Islands 24/7?

I‚Äôm so thankful to my community who supports me through membership and helps my channels grow. As a thank you, I host the treasure islands 24/7 inside my Discord server in the members-only area. You can become a member of Pange Plays by either:

Become a discord subscribed member via mee6

OR Subscribing on Pange Plays Twitch

OR Become a Superfan Member on Pange Plays YouTube

Then to access the 24/7 ACNH treasure islands join our Discord. If you subscribed on Twitch or became a YouTube superfan, you‚Äôll have to link your Discord account to the social service. If you subscribe on Discord via Mee6, login to my Discord server using the same Discord user account that you used to sign up.

By doing either of these three things, you can access the members only area to get my dodo codes any time, plus use my item spawner bots to drop items on request or inject adoptable villagers. For Twitch and YouTube integration, you‚Äôll need to link your Discord account to your Twitch or YouTube in your Discord account settings.

Remember if you have Prime on Amazon, you get 1 free Twitch subscription every month! So please consider subbing to the channel to help us keep these islands alive!

Thank you for your support!

P.S. Check out my new Animal Crossing New Horizons villager guessing game!

I can‚Äôt find what I‚Äôm looking for!

Looking for something specific? Search the member islands by item name!
